data.title: Happy Birthday Mike Wallace
data.text:
Happy Birthday Mike Wallace

Author/writer/blogger/storyteller/microblogger/vlogger

This post was published on the now-closed HuffPost Contributor platform. Contributors control their own work and posted freely to our site. If you need to flag this entry as abusive, send us an email.

Myron Leon Wallace sunrise 5/9/1918 Brookline, Massachusetts, sunset 4/7/2012, New Canaan, Connecticut.

Surname was originally Wallik.

He was Jewish.

Graduated from the University of Michigan.

Was a reporter for the student newspaper while in college.

Served in the U.S. Navy.

Started out in radio after graduation.

Announced wrestling.

In 1959 produced a five-part documentary about the Nation of Islam, The Hate the Hate Produced.

Did commercials for Phillip Morris.

Battled depression and attempted suicide.

Nixon wanted him as his press secretary.

His big regret was not getting to interview First Lady Pat Nixon.

Peace, love, joy, gratitude, faith, courage, compassion, and blessings.
